turns.en: You’re making a complaint politely. Start by stating the problem and asking a question.
turns.zh: 你要禮貌抱怨。先說問題，再丟一個問題。

turns.hint_en: Hi—my order is late. Could you check the status for me?

turns.en: I’m sorry about that. What’s your order number?

turns.hint_en: It’s 58321. Also, can you tell me the estimated delivery time?

turns.en: Thanks. I see it was delayed by the courier. It should arrive tomorrow.
turns.zh: 謝謝。我看到快遞延誤了，應該明天到。

turns.hint_en: Can you waive the delivery fee because of the delay?

turns.en: I can apply a $5 credit. Would that work for you?
turns.zh: 我可以補償 5 美元點數，可以嗎？

turns.hint_en: $5 credit works. Can you apply it to my next order automatically?

turns.en: Yes, it will be added to your account and used next time.
turns.zh: 可以，會加到帳戶，下次自動抵扣。

turns.hint_en: Great—so the credit will be in my account for next time, right?
